name: Closet
desc: A well-constructed built-in closet with a full-length mirror. It's also where I change my clothes.

name: Workbench
desc: A workbench popular with DIY enthusiasts. Its sturdy and practical design makes it perfect for crafting items.

name: Cooking
desc: A well-stocked kitchen. I could probably make anything I could dream of with the right ingredients and recipe.

name: Plants
desc: Our home garden. It's small but well maintained. I could grow and pick plants here.

name: Display Case
desc: A large display case with multiple shelves. I could use them to show off my capsule collection.

name: Airsoft Shop
desc: A shop that sells imitation weapons. I can trade for <color=#FF423F>5â˜… weapons</color> here.

name: Clinic
desc: A private clinic with irregular hours. Only a select few seem to have seen the doctor inside. I can buy medicine here.

name: Club Bulletin Board
desc: A bulletin board in the school courtyard with posters for various clubs that I could join.

name: Batting Cages
desc: The fastest pitching machine in Japan is installed here. I could hone my baseball skills here.

name: Shibuya Capsule Machine
desc: Capsule machines set up on the street. They give out random capsules from their respective series.

name: Zoshigaya Capsule Machine
desc: Capsule machines with promotional cards that are updated regularly.

name: Shinjuku Capsule Machine
desc: Insert a coin and twist the knob to score a random capsule.

name: Shibuya Capsule Machines
desc: Insert a coin and twist the knob to score a random capsule.

name: Secondhand Shop
desc: A secondhand shop known to have pretty much everything. I could buy materials and items needed for crafting here.

name: Supermarket
desc: A store that sells various natural ingredients and seasonal produce. I could buy ingredients here.

name: Supermarket
desc: A well-reputed grocery store. It offers a wide variety of products. I could purchase various items here.

name: Flower Shop
desc: A popular shop that sells lovely flowers. I could buy gardening supplies here.

name: Flower Shop
desc: A quiet shop in the heart of the city. It sells flowers, art, and household goods. I can buy gardening supplies here.
